stories.text:
Facebook adds new features like story highlights and timeline view to creator studio.

Pinterest added new “profiles” tab to search results to promote Pin creators.

YouTube added new updates to studio app adding video monetisation appeal for creators

Meta shuts down its experimental app “sparked” and is set to shut down their another app called “collabs”.

Y Combinator launched a new plan for startups and that new plan is said to change the investing industry.

Nigeria lifts Twitter ban after banning the platform for 7 months.

Twitter rolls out space recordings for All Users.

Instagram launched a new “subscription” feature for creators and businesses to monetize through paid content.

Twitter finally brings communities feature to it’s android app and added new NFT profile image display option for Twitter Blue subscribers.

Meta working on features to create and sell NFTs. The company is planning to launch a NFT marketplace.

Instagram expands “Remix” feature to All Video Formats and now you can remix more than just reels!

LinkedIn Added 3 Free Marketing courses to LinkedIn learning labs.

YouTube shuts down “YouTube Originals”.

LinkedIn announced retirement of it’s LinkedIn lite app.

Instagram adds scheduled live displays on users’ profiles. You will see Scheduled live sessions when you visit someone’s profile.

Tiktok launched “Tiktok Tactics”’. A free course to help marketers and online businesses grow their brand on Tiktok.

Amazon abandoned its Twitter influencer campaign.

Snapchat leveled up AR shopping feature with real-time pricing and more product details.

Meta launches Facebook reels To All Users.

Snapchat Adds New Live Location Feature to help keep Users safe.

Twitter adds new bot labels to identify bot accounts In-stream.

Facebook Renames News feed to just ‘Feed’ to avoid confusion.

Instagram adds story likes to promote in-app engagement.

Snapchat announced they will enable ability to add mid-roll ads for Top Creators.

LinkedIn tests new options to keep political posts off your feed.

Tiktok updates community Guidelines to provide more protection for users.

Twitter expands test of downvotes to comments section.

Snapchat rises to 319 million daily users and posts strong revenue in Q4.

Mr Beast launched Feastables.

Tumblr introduces a tipping feature.

LinkedIn launched a podcast network.

Facebook added ability to run ads between reels for creators promising share of revenue.

Tiktok launched 10-minutes video limit

Reddit introduced Tiktok and Instagram lookalike discover Tab.

Instagram added auto-generated captions to videos.

LinkedIn acquired marketing analytics company Oribi.

Clubhouse Adds In-room Chat providing another opportunity to engage with other users.

Reddit Expands ‘Creator Stats’ Post Insights to More Users on Desktop.

LinkedIn profiles can now display career breaks.

Instagram Launches New creator lab to help creators maximise their On-Platform Performance.

Twitter adds new dashboard to help creators track their earnings.

Tiktok launched a music distribution platform called “SoundOn”.

Instagram launches New moderator Option for IG Live streams.

Google Launches New ‘Related Search for Content’ Ads to Help Improve On-Site Engagement

Wordpress launched an official plugin called “performance lab” to speed up your website.

Tiktok officially launched “TikTok stories”.

Pinterest Provides New Ways to Share Idea Pins Across to Other Apps.

Get All 70+ updates here below through link. I can't add all due to character limit.

Here you go:- https://thesocialjuice.ck.page/dd1799fd26

Tiktok launches Search Ads in Beta for selected Advertising partners.
